task_variants.name: github_issues_summary
task_variants.task: Find all GitHub issues assigned to me that mention 'bug' or 'error', check if any have related Slack discussions in #bugs channel, create a summary document with: issue title, description, and related Slack context, and post it to #engineering channel with priority tags based on issue labels.
task_variants.description: Complex multi-step task: GitHub → Slack → Document → Post
task_variants.success_metric: Check for: (1) Summary doc created, (2) Message posted to #engineering with doc link

task_variants.name: deployment_summary
task_variants.task: Find all Slack messages in #engineering from last week that mention 'deploy' or 'release', check corresponding GitHub pull requests, create a deployment summary in Google Sheets with columns: Date, PR, Author, Status, and notify the team in Slack.
task_variants.description: Complex multi-step task: Slack → GitHub → Sheets → Slack notification
task_variants.success_metric: Google Sheet created with deployment summary and Slack notification sent

task_variants.name: work_summary
task_variants.task: Create a weekly work summary: Get my Google Calendar events for next week, get my GitHub pull requests from last week (all repos), get my Slack messages from #engineering channel from last week, combine all information into a structured Google Doc, and share the document with my manager.
task_variants.description: Complex multi-step task: Calendar → GitHub → Slack → Doc → Share
task_variants.success_metric: A Google Doc is created with all information and shared with manager

task_variants.name: email_task_extraction
task_variants.task: Find all unread emails from last month that contain 'meeting' or 'urgent', extract any action items or deadlines mentioned, create a prioritized task list in Google Sheets with columns: Task, Deadline, Priority, and send me a summary email with the sheet link.
task_variants.description: Complex multi-step task: Email → Extract → Sheets → Email
task_variants.success_metric: Google Sheet created with tasks and summary email sent

bayesian_analysis.note: Beta(1,1) is uniform prior for success rates

failure_types.A: Asking for input instead of executing
